Posted By: Mitch_360 (7/29/2011 10:01:25 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Probably the best bounce spell ever made. Its wide field of application, ease of casting and ability to render an entire strategy worthless in a single card overwhelmingly make up for the increase in cost compared to [Unsummon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Unsummon) and the inability to target lands a la [Boomerang](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Boomerang).  
You can always find something useful to do with this card.
posts.html:

You can always find something useful to do with this card.

posts.post_content:
Blue felt left out by [Maelstrom Pulse](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Maelstrom Pulse), so they printed its own special, highly abuseable version of it.  
  
Not much else to say, other than it's going to replace most of the instances of [Boomerang](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Boomerang) I use in my various decks. I'll keep one or two for just-in-case scenarios, but this guy has just stepped up to the prime time.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
So much more useful than the other "Echoing" spells.  
  
you got a bunch of tokens? 'ECHOING TRUTH!"  
they all get returned to their owner's hand, but since they are tokens, they cease to exist. I don't care how big your tokens are, they are GONE!
